name: Opening of the New City of London School
engraver: Joseph Shepherd Wyon & Alfred Benjamin Wyon
obverse: Busts of Prince and Princess of Wales facing right.
reverse: A view of the school building. To the left of the building is the coat of arms of the Prince of Wales. The right of the building is the coat of arms of the City of London.
reverse_inscriptions: CITY OF LONDON SCHOOL NEW BUILDING OPENED
BY HIS ROYAL HIGHNESS THE PRINCE OF WALES 12 DEC. 1882
description: This medal is part of the City of London series.
